casebody.data:
Patrick Todd BAYLIFF
v.
STATE of North Carolina, Honorable J.B. Allen, Jr. No. 81P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Patrick Todd Bayliff, Pro Se. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd day of February 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
